title: Department of Defense support for unknown "Religious Freedom Documentary"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the Department of Defense (DoD) and the production of "Religious Freedom Documentary (Untitled)," a title which appears on an attached list, released to me through FOIA by DoD, of TV and movie productions supported by DoD in 2023. I request any and all documents pertaining to DoD involvement with the production of "Religious Freedom Documentary (Untitled)." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of DoD and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Religious Freedom Documentary (Untitled)," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Department of Defense support for upcoming Channel 4 series "School Swap"

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the Department of Defense (DoD) and the production of the upcoming "School Swap" TV series, from Love Productions and Channel 4 in the UK. I request any and all documents pertaining to DoD involvement with the production of "School Swap." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of DoD and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "School Swap," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

Attached is a list, released to me through FOIA by DoD, of TV and movie productions supported by DoD in 2023; "School Swap" is included on that list.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Department of Defense support for upcoming Steven Spielberg-produced documentary on composer John Williams

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the Department of Defense (DoD) and the production of the upcoming "Legacy" documentary on movie composer John Williams, produced by Steven Spielberg. I request any and all documents pertaining to DoD involvement with the production of the "Legacy"-John Williams documentary. Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of DoD and members of the cast, crew, and production company of the documentary, including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

title: Department of Defense support for 2024 film "The Forge"
